TI: [Intracellular study of interaction of paired-pulse facilitation and late phase of hippocampal long-term potentiation].
AB: Presynaptic paired-pulse facilitation (PPF) rate decreased in most CA1 pyramidal neurones following the long-term potantiation (LTP) induction. The decrease correlated with the LTP magnitude as well as with the initial (pretetanic) PPF rate. The data obtained suggests an involvement of presynaptic mechanisms in maintaining the early and the delayed LTPs.
AD: Brain Research Institute of the Russian Acad. Med. Sci., Moscow, Russia.
TT: Vnutrikletochnoe issledovanie vzaimodeistviia mezhdu parnoi fasilitatsiei i pozdnei fazoi dolgovremennoi gippokampal'noi potentsiatsii.
TA: Ross Fiziol Zh Im I M Sechenova
JT: Rossiiskii fiziologicheskii zhurnal imeni I.M. Sechenova
SO: Ross Fiziol Zh Im I M Sechenova. 1998 May-Jun;84(5-6):426-35.
